text: Shemar Moore will return to “ Criminal Minds ” for the Season 12 finale, Variety has learned. Moore, an original cast member on “ Criminal Minds, ” starred on the CBS series from 2005 through 2016 when he departed the show at the end of the eleventh season. The Season 12 finale airs on Wednesday, May 10 at 9 p. m. He ’ ll reprise his role as Derek Morgan. In the episode, Morgan brings the BAU a lead in the case against serial killer and escaped convict Mr. Scratch, who has wreaked havoc on the team all season.
